</li>
<li id="cite_note-320"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-320">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFBlackburnCasseyDuncanEvans2004">Blackburn, T; Cassey, P; Duncan, R; Evans, K; Gaston, K (24 September 2004). "Avian Extinction and Mammalian Introductions on Oceanic Islands". <i><a href="/wiki/Science_(journal)" title="Science (journal)">Science</a></i>. <b>305</b> (5692): 1955–1958. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Bibcode_(identifier)" title="Bibcode (identifier)">Bibcode</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://ui.adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2004Sci...305.1955B" rel="nofollow">2004Sci...305.1955B</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1126%2Fscience.1101617" rel="nofollow">10.1126/science.1101617</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/PMID_(identifier)" title="PMID (identifier)">PMID</a> <a class="external text" href="//pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/15448269" rel="nofollow">15448269</a>. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/S2CID_(identifier)" title="S2CID (identifier)">S2CID</a> <a class="external text" href="https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:31211118" rel="nofollow">31211118</a>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Science&amp;rft.atitle=Avian+Extinction+and+Mammalian+Introductions+on+Oceanic+Islands&amp;rft.volume=305&amp;rft.issue=5692&amp;rft.pages=1955-1958&amp;rft.date=2004-09-24&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1126%2Fscience.1101617&amp;rft_id=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.semanticscholar.org%2FCorpusID%3A31211118%23id-name%3DS2CID&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F15448269&amp;rft_id=info%3Abibcode%2F2004Sci...305.1955B&amp;rft.aulast=Blackburn&amp;rft.aufirst=T&amp;rft.au=Cassey%2C+P&amp;rft.au=Duncan%2C+R&amp;rft.au=Evans%2C+K&amp;rft.au=Gaston%2C+K&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ABird"></span></span>
</li>
<li id="cite_note-321"><span class="mw-cite-backlink"><b><a href="#cite_ref-321">^</a></b></span> <span class="reference-text"><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r1067248974" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><cite class="citation journal cs1" id="CITEREFButchartStattersfieldCollar2006">Butchart, S.; Stattersfield, A.; Collar, N (2006). <a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1017%2FS0030605306000950" rel="nofollow">"How many bird extinctions have we prevented?"</a>. <i>Oryx</i>. <b>40</b> (3): 266–79. <a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Doi_(identifier)" title="Doi (identifier)">doi</a>:<span class="cs1-lock-free" title="Freely accessible"><a class="external text" href="https://doi.org/10.1017%2FS0030605306000950" rel="nofollow">10.1017/S0030605306000950</a></span>.</cite><span class="Z3988" title="ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.jtitle=Oryx&amp;rft.atitle=How+many+bird+extinctions+have+we+prevented%3F&amp;rft.volume=40&amp;rft.issue=3&amp;rft.pages=266-79&amp;rft.date=2006&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1017%2FS0030605306000950&amp;rft.aulast=Butchart&amp;rft.aufirst=S.&amp;rft.au=Stattersfield%2C+A.&amp;rft.au=Collar%2C+N&amp;rft_id=%2F%2Fdoi.org%2F10.1017%252FS0030605306000950&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fen.wikipedia.org%3ABird"></span></span>
</li>
</ol></div></div>

<li><a class="external text" href="http://www.stanford.edu/group/stanfordbirds/text/essays/completed_essays.html" rel="nofollow">Essays on bird biology</a></li>
<li><a class="external text" href="http://www.mrnussbaum.com/birdsindex.htm" rel="nofollow">North American Birds for Kids</a> <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20100809090128/http://www.mrnussbaum.com/birdsindex.htm" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> 9 August 2010 at the <a href="/wiki/Wayback_Machine" title="Wayback Machine">Wayback Machine</a></li>
<li><a class="external text" href="http://www.ornithology.com/" rel="nofollow">Ornithology</a></li>
<li><a class="external text" href="http://sora.unm.edu/" rel="nofollow">Sora</a> – Searchable online research archive; Archives of the following ornithological journals <i><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/The_Auk" title="The Auk">The Auk</a></i>, <i><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Condor_(journal)" title="Condor (journal)">Condor</a></i>, <i>Journal of Field Ornithology'</i>, <i>North American Bird Bander</i>, <i>Studies in Avian Biology</i>, <i>Pacific Coast Avifauna</i>, and the <i><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/The_Wilson_Bulletin" title="The Wilson Bulletin">Wilson Bulletin</a></i>.</li>
<li><a class="external text" href="http://ibc.lynxeds.com/" rel="nofollow">The Internet Bird Collection</a> – A free library of videos of the world's birds</li>
<li><a class="external text" href="http://www.birdpop.org/" rel="nofollow">The Institute for Bird Populations, California</a></li>
<li><a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20100323064035/http://media.library.uiuc.edu/cgi/b/bib/bix-idx?c=bix%3Bcc%3Dbix%3Bsid%3D0c4f6243857204b94fcdebc6dce5d8b2%3Btype%3Dsimple%3Bpage%3Dbrowse%3Binst%3Dbix_10%3Bsort%3Dregion" rel="nofollow">List of field guides to birds</a>, from the International Field Guides database</li>
<li><a class="external text" href="http://www.rspb.org.uk/wildlife/birdidentifier/" rel="nofollow">RSPB bird identifier</a> <a class="external text" href="https://web.archive.org/web/20131105112202/http://www.rspb.org.uk/wildlife/birdidentifier/" rel="nofollow">Archived</a> 5 November 2013 at the <a href="/wiki/Wayback_Machine" title="Wayback Machine">Wayback Machine</a> – Interactive identification of all UK birds</li>
<li><a class="external text" href="http://www.ucmp.berkeley.edu/diapsids/avians.html" rel="nofollow">Are Birds Really Dinosaurs?</a> — University of California Museum of Paleontology.</li></ul>

<ul><li><a href="/wiki/Actinopterygii" title="Actinopterygii">Actinopterygii <small>(ray-finned fish)</small></a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%;line-height:1.2em;"><span style="margin:-32px;display: inline-block;-webkit-transform: rotate(270deg);-moz-transform: rotate(270deg);-ms-transform: rotate(270deg);-o-transform: rotate(270deg);transform: rotate(270deg);"><a href="/wiki/Sarcopterygii" title="Sarcopterygii">Sarcopterygii<br/><small><link href="mw-data:TemplateStyles:r886047488" rel="mw-deduplicated-inline-style"/><span class="nobold">(lobe-finned fish)</span></small></a></span></th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em"></div><table class="nowraplinks navbox-subgroup" style="border-spacing:0"><tbody><tr><td class="navbox-list navbox-even" colspan="2" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">
<ul><li><a class="mw-redirect" href="/wiki/Actinistia" title="Actinistia">Actinistia <small>(coelacanths)</small></a>¹</li></ul>

</div></td></tr></tbody></table><div></div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%"><abbr aria-label="Extinct" style="border: none; text-decoration: none; cursor: inherit; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;" title="Extinct">†</abbr><a href="/wiki/Vegaviidae" title="Vegaviidae">Vegaviidae</a></th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-even" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

</div></td></tr><tr><th class="navbox-group" scope="row" style="width:1%"><abbr aria-label="Extinct" style="border: none; text-decoration: none; cursor: inherit; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal;" title="Extinct">†</abbr><a href="/wiki/Cimolopterygidae" title="Cimolopterygidae">Cimolopterygidae</a></th><td class="navbox-list-with-group navbox-list navbox-odd" style="width:100%;padding:0"><div style="padding:0 0.25em">

<li><a href="/wiki/List_of_birds_of_Australia" title="List of birds of Australia">Australian</a></li></ul>
</div></td></tr></tbody></table></div>
